net.sf.mmm.util.query.api.feature

Interface FeaturePaging<SELF extends FeaturePaging<SELF>>

  • Type Parameters:
    SELF - the generic type of this query itself (this) for fluent API calls.
    All Superinterfaces:
    FeatureLimit<SELF>, StatementFeature
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    JpqlSelectStatement<E>, OrientDbSelectStatement<E>, SelectStatement<E,SELF>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSelectStatement, FeaturePagingImpl, JpqlSelectStatementImpl, OrientDbSelectStatementImpl

    public interface FeaturePaging<SELF extends FeaturePaging<SELF>>
extends FeatureLimit<SELF>
    StatementFeature for a Statement with paging support via FeatureLimit.limit(int) and offset(long).
    Since:
    8.0.0
    Author:
    hohwille

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SELF offset(long offset)
      Set the offset for the query results.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.sf.mmm.util.query.api.feature.FeatureLimit

        limit

    • Method Detail

      • offset

        SELF offset(long offset)
        Set the offset for the query results. Should be called only once per query. The offset is useful for paging results in combination with FeatureLimit.limit(int)).
        Parameters:
        offset - the number of results to skip.
        Returns:
        this query instance for fluent API calls.
